text:
Hello everyone,
We have a problem sending an email to the users downloaded our theme from the marketplace.
Dashboard says email has sent and delivered. (we are using the "asset marketplace provider account")
One of the test emails was a Gmail account with no filtering, it was to test if it the email is sent successfully.  I didn't receive the email even though it status is "sent" and "delivered".

hi <@UNQ6UDGSJ> + team, we've corrected all the errors from our previous submission. im still getting a greyed out "submit for approval" button. ive refreshed the page and cleared cache... any suggestions?

<@U22PWJ41G>, they had this same issue when submitting the first time... see here: <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C2YGWHDKQ/p1606234991178800>

Anything we can do?
It normally takes a couple of minutes to validate. You should be able to refresh that step and it will allow you to submit once both checkboxes are selected
